title: If You Like Halo 3 You Should Put a Ring on it
description: This week The Besties are discussing Halo 3! Together they look back to its highly anticipated release in 2007. The criticism around the infamous cliffhanger ending. Their favorite vehicles, weapons and campaigns. Plus, get nostalgic for H3’s limited edition gaming soda.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
